name: Capcom Generation 1: Dai 1 Shuu Gekitsuiou no Jidai
name_original: Capcom Generation 1: Dai 1 Shuu Gekitsuiou no Jidai
description:
Capcom Generation 1: Dai 1 Shuu Gekitsuiou no Jidai (カプコン・ジェネレーション　～第１集　撃墜王の時代～) is a Compilation/Shoot 'Em Up video game published by Capcom released on August 27th, 1998 for the Sony PlayStation & Sega Saturn.

1942
1943
*1943 Kai
